name: reply_in_thread
description: Reply to a message by creating or adding to a thread

input_parameters.name: message
input_parameters.description: The textual message to send in thread

input_parameters.name: message_context
input_parameters.description: An individual instance of a message

input_parameters.name: reply_broadcast
input_parameters.description: Also send the message to the top-level conversation.

input_parameters.name: metadata
input_parameters.description: Additional [metadata](/metadata/publishing) about the message, which can then be used an [workflow event trigger](/automation/triggers/event).

input_parameters.name: interactive_blocks
input_parameters.description: Buttons to send with the message. Must be wrapped in a block. Only accepts the [`workflow_button`](/reference/block-kit/block-elements#workflow_button) element.

output_parameters.name: message_context
output_parameters.description: An individual instance of the message you sent
Permalink URL of the message that was sent
output_parameters.name: message_link
